attributes.action: Support for Deputy Lord Mayor Ali Ahmed
attributes.additional_details:
The petition is to show support to Mr Ali. He is under pressure to resign as Cardiff Deputy Lord Mayor because of his stance for the injustice in Palestine and around the world

Please show support for Mr. Ali help and his humanitarian support to our fellow brothers and sister in Palestine

You can sign the petition and email Marie Rosenthal  (marie.rosenthal@cardiff.gov.uk) to show support for the Lord Mayor.

We only have until Tuesday morning!!

Tweet  councillor @cllr_AliAhmed
